user_query: I told my mother and she said yeah but you know they have a nice life they have a really beautiful life so foreign foreign I've worked so hard for now all that is being ripped away we become ridiculous incapable comic but this is not Who We Are this is our disease I am not suffering I am struggling struggling to be a part of things stay connected to who I once was thank you [Applause]

entities.entity_description: 화자의 어머니로, "그들은 좋은 삶을 살고 있다, 정말 아름다운 삶"이라고 말한 인물

relationships.relationship_description: 화자가 어머니에게 무언가를 말했고 어머니가 응답함
